thread.title: Melody McGinnis
thread.title_full: Microfiber Wholesale reviewed by Melody McGinnis

author: Melody McGinnis
title: Melody McGinnis
text: I am impressed with the quality of this mop - nice and sturdy with excellent dust pads - makes my life a lot easier - can clean my hardwood floors in a SNAP! The 26" pads are perfect for my home! Now I am looking for a 26" charging bucket for the wet pads - not easy to find!!!
